##### Create a XYZ
```
interface Tunnel0
 ip address 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.252 #or ip unnumbered <interface>
 tunnel source GigabitEthernet0/0
 tunnel destination 203.0.113.2
 tunnel mode ipsec ipv4
```

##### Define the XYZ
```
crypto isakmp policy 10
 encryption aes 256
 hash sha256
 authentication pre-share
 group 14
 lifetime 86400
```
